alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 12:12AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Fayette and southeastern Shelby Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1211 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Collierville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Collierville, Germantown, Cordova, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Somerville, Eads, Warren, Macon, Oakland, Piperton, Williston, Lenow, Fisherville, Elba, Canadaville, Longtown, Lambert and Kirk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for western Tennessee.
